syncsetting_dialog.title: Block Sync Settings
syncsetting_dialog.browser_synced_hint: Blocks are only accessible across devices if you use cloud storage.
syncsetting_dialog.consent_invalid_tooltip: Make sure youâ€™re connected to the internet and signed in to your Autodesk account to turn on this option. Changes made to this setting may not immediately apply.
syncsetting_dialog.consent_valid_tooltip: Allows AutoCAD to store your cloud storage user name. Changes made to this setting may not immediately apply.
syncsetting_dialog.consent_check_string: Remember my cloud storage user names across devices.
syncsetting_dialog.invalid_folder_modal_content: The specified folder was not found. Please specify the correct foldername. The value previously saved for the folder will be used.
